job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Would you like to join an awardwinning company which is changing and building the future telecom providing ALLG cloudnative OpenRAN portfolio in their bestinclass products Read on if your answer is YESbrbrMy client a world leading Telco vendor is currently seeking a Sr Layer23 Stack SW Engineer with 7 years of CC development of embedded realtime components and good understanding of 5GLTE standard exposure to help expand my clients offering across the globe This is a great opportunity to join an organization dedicated to its customer base through its desire to deliver disruptive Radio productsbrbrWhat you MUST bring to the teambrbr	MUST 7 plus years experience in CC programming language development of embeddedrealtime components of a multithreaded systembr	Possess strong foundation in troubleshooting and debugging activities in endtoend software development cyclebr	Ability to work independently without close supervision and act as a part of a global team in a multisite organizationbr	Demonstrates good understanding of communication protocols  Ability to translate L2L3 standards and specifications towards efficient implementationbr	Solid handson experience with SW development methodologies Design documentation SW implementation unit testing etcbr	Essential to have strong communication skillsbr	MUST BSc in Computer Science  Computer Engineering or top IDF SW development unitbrbrbrbrNice to havebr	Experience in Linux OS user application developmentbr	Past experience with telecom communication standards preferable 4G5Gbr	Past experience with ContainersdockersKubernetes K8S technologiesbr	Experienced with RAN associated test equipments such as UE simulatorsQXDMbr	Experience with cellular modems  design implementation etcbr
